** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:use_cooldown}}: If present, this item applies a [[use cooldown]] to all items of the same type when it has been used.
*** {{nbt|float|seconds}}: The use cooldown duration in seconds.
*** {{nbt|string|cooldown_group}}: The unique [[resource location]] to identify this cooldown group. If present, the item is included in a use cooldown group and no longer shares cooldowns with its base item type, but instead with any other items that are part of the same use cooldown group. Optional.
</onlyinclude>
